definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: Besides this, Javert possessed in his eye the feline phosphorescence of night birds.
sentences.chinese: 況且沙威的眼睛有着夜鳥那種象貓一樣的磷光。

sentences.english: At this moment , a night bird is leading the poet setting off along ta warm road, warm amniotic fluids .
sentences.chinese: 此刻夜鳥正引領着詩人上路，一條羊水般溫暖的路。

sentences.english: The birds of night peck at the first stars, that flash like my soule when I love you.
sentences.chinese: 夜鳥啄食初現的羣星，羣星閃爍恰似深愛你的魂靈。
